embeds.title: 📌 RULES & INFO
embeds.description: Please read and follow all the rules below to keep the server safe, fun, and respectful for everyone.

fields.name: 📜 Server Rules:
fields.value: Basic server-wide rules. Respect others, avoid spam, no NSFW, and follow staff instructions. Respect others, avoid spam, and help maintain a friendly environment.

fields.name: 🎧 Voice Chat Rules:
fields.value: When using voice channels, be respectful and responsible. No mic abuse, no trolling, and always follow the main server rules.

fields.name: 📄 Terms Of Service:
fields.value: Do **NOT** violate Roblox’s [Terms of Service](https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004647846-Roblox-Terms-of-Use) or Discord’s [Terms of Service](https://discord.com/terms). Doing so may result in punishment.

fields.name: ⚠️ Strike System:
fields.value:
**Verbal Warning** – Nothing
**1 Warning** – Nothing
**2 Warnings** – 1h mute
**3 Warnings** – 6h mute
**4 Warnings** – 1d mute
**5 Warnings** – Ban

embeds.title: 📜 Server Rules
embeds.description: Welcome to the server! Please follow these rules to keep the community safe and enjoyable for everyone.

fields.name: 🔹 Keep It Friendly
fields.value: Be respectful to everyone. Harassment, discrimination, or hate speech is not tolerated.

fields.name: 🔹 Follow Staff Instructions
fields.value: Listen to server staff. Ignoring them may result in warnings or bans.

fields.name: 🔹 No Off-Topic Disruptions
fields.value: Use channels correctly and keep conversations relevant.

fields.name: 🔹 No NSFW Content
fields.value: NSFW content of any kind (text, images, or media) is strictly prohibited.

fields.name: 🔹 No Flooding or Spam
fields.value: Avoid excessive messages, self-promotion, and disruptive spam.

fields.name: 🔹 Keep It Civil
fields.value: No trolling, flaming, or intentional arguments.

fields.name: 🔹 Protect Your Privacy
fields.value: Do not share personal details like addresses, phone numbers, or social media.

fields.name: 🔹 Keep Language Clean
fields.value: Use appropriate language. Keep conversations suitable for all audiences.

fields.name: ⚠️ Consequences for Rule Violations
fields.value: Breaking rules may result in warnings, mutes, kicks, or bans. Ask a moderator if you're unsure.

embeds.title: 🎧 Voice Chat Rules
embeds.description: Please follow these guidelines when using voice channels to keep the experience enjoyable for everyone.

fields.name: 🔹 No Mic Spamming or Blasting
fields.value: Do not blast music, scream, or create disruptive noise in voice chat. Use push-to-talk if needed.

fields.name: 🔹 Follow All Server Rules
fields.value: The main server rules still apply in voice chat. Disrespect, trolling, or inappropriate behavior won't be tolerated.

fields.name: 🔹 Be Respectful While Speaking
fields.value: Don't talk over others or dominate the conversation. Let everyone have a chance to speak.

fields.name: 🔹 Use Common Sense
fields.value: If you're unsure whether something's okay to say or do, play it safe and don’t do it.

fields.name: 🔹 Keep Conversations Appropriate
fields.value: Avoid discussions or jokes that are offensive or inappropriate for the server’s audience.

fields.name: 🔹 Use Voice Channels Responsibly
fields.value: Please be mindful of others using the voice channel. Avoid speaking excessively or engaging in disruptive behavior.

footer.text: Breaking voice chat rules can result in being muted, kicked, or banned from VC.
